alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Brantley, eastern Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Race Pond, or 10 miles northwest of Folkston, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland, Race Pond and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton
